question: 延長
partsOfSpeech: intransitive, noun, transitive, する verb
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Prolong</kanji> it for a <kanji>long</kanji> while. We need more time. We need a <vocabulary>prolonging</vocabulary> or <vocabulary> extension</vocabulary> of some kind.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
